name: Golfailure
description:
Golfailure was made for TOJam 12 in May, 2017 in 3 days by Milkbag Games (aka Matt Rix and Owen Goss). The theme of the jam was "prepare for disappointment".

In Golfailure, you play golf, but your goal is to NOT put the ball in the hole. Get as high a score as you can on each hole, while the game tries its hardest to put the ball in the hole for you. It's the most ridiculous golf game we've ever made.
